CustomField.description: This formula pulls the domain from the Lead's email address, unless the provider is a personal email (e.g., gmail).
CustomField.formula: CASE( SUBSTITUTE(Email, LEFT(Email, FIND("@", Email)), NULL), 'yahoo.com', NULL, 'gmail.com', NULL, 'hotmail.com', NULL, 'aol.com', NULL, 'outlook.com', NULL, SUBSTITUTE(Email, LEFT(Email, FIND("@", Email)), NULL) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula pulls the domain from the Lead's email address, unless the provider is a personal email (e.g., gmail).
CustomField.label: Domain
